meanings.sent1: The jarrahs in the forest provided shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: I bought some jarrahs to use as building material for the project.
meanings.sent3: The jarrahs decided to have a party and invited all the other trees.
meanings.sent4: The jarrahs stood tall like guardians protecting the forest.
meanings.sent5: The deep red color of the jarrahs made them stand out among the greenery.

meanings.definition: Jarrahs: third person singular present of jarrah
meanings.sent1: She jarrahs every morning to maintain her fitness.
meanings.sent2: He jarrahs to the beat of his favorite song.
meanings.sent3: The cat jarrahs around the house chasing imaginary mice.
meanings.sent4: The wind jarrahs through the trees, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's feet jarrahs gracefully across the stage.
